Create IAM Policy AllowPushPullPolicy and assign to user

```
{
  "Version": "2012-10-17",
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "GetAuthorizationToken",
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Action": [
        "ecr:GetAuthorizationToken"
      ],
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Action": [
        "ecr:BatchGetImage",
        "ecr:BatchCheckLayerAvailability",
        "ecr:CompleteLayerUpload",
        "ecr:GetDownloadUrlForLayer",
        "ecr:InitiateLayerUpload",
        "ecr:PutImage",
        "ecr:UploadLayerPart"
      ],
      "Resource": [
        "arn:aws:ecr:us-east-1:424432388155:repository/lesson-086"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
More info to setup the user policy: https://github.com/antonputra/tutorials/tree/main/lessons/086
